about_the_game:
Darktopia is a rogue-lite game with turn-based battles and RPG elements. Embark on an epic journey through a dark utopian world, where corruption spreads like a plague, and every decision could mean the difference between survival and doom. Protect your team from the ever-corrupting infection while uncovering the secrets of this mysterious dystopia.

The demo contains the first 3 levels of the game. All the screenshots and the gameplay video are from the demo.

Features:


▪ Shared Battlefield

Move your heroes strategically within enemy lines to turn their own attacks against them with ease.


▪ Turn-Based Combat

Strategize your actions in tactical, turn-based battles.

▪ Dark Utopian Atmosphere

Immerse yourself in a beautiful pixel-art world filled with haunting landscapes, futuristic ruins, and oppressive shadows.

▪ Corruption Mechanic

Balance risk and reward as the infection threatens to consume your team. How far will you go to achieve your mission?
